attributes.action: Allow small weddings during lockdown and high tiers
attributes.additional_details: So many people (myself included) have gone through the heartache of planning a wedding to then have it postponed. Now we have gone into another lockdown people who moved their weddings once have to do so again as well as others who now have to postpone for the first time. My wedding is due for May and I am terrified I will not allowed to marry the love of my life.
attributes.background: Allow people to get married during lockdown and tiers with two witnesses and the registrar.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Revise guidance to allow Civil Weddings with 6 guests during all lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565330

Allow couples to get married in tier 4 with only two witnesses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564368
